name: El_Paca
description:
Hello all. the game is about an alpaca in a cap named El_paco, who lives on a farm. but one day bombs start falling on her house. the aliens find out about it and send a protective dome that helps the alpaca hide from the bombs.

look closely at the color of the cap. the aliens send signals to it, and it changes color. it tells the alpaca the safe color zone

Controls
WFrowardALeftSBackwardDRightCameraMouse
